포탈은 제 인생 게임입니다.
새로운 방식의 퍼즐 게임들을 찾아 다니는 편이라 여태까지 수많은 퍼즐류 게임들을 플레이해 보았지만, 처음으로 접한 스팀 게임인 포탈만큼 재미있고 몰입감 있는 퍼즐 게임은 아직까지 만나지 못했습니다. 단순하고 직관적인 조작으로 이렇게나 다채로운 그림을 그려 나갈 수 있다는 게 정말 너무 대단합니다!_!
혼자 스토리 모드를 깨는 것도 정말 재미있으며, 코옵으로 다른 사람과 함께 퍼즐을 풀어 나가는 것도 재미있습니다. 이 게임을 살 지 말 지 고민하고 계시다면........ 고민할 이유가 없습니다. 그냥 지르세요, 무조건 지르세요. 젇대 후회하지 않으실 겁니다 :)
Supera al 1 en todo aspecto muy buena historia y puzzles divertidos y el coop es muy bueno

Great game that still has an active community for multiplayer. Provided about 14 hours of game play to run through the solo and duo campaign and then still has hours of fun content by solving community created tests. The game builds on the core mechanics of Portal and continues to have it's humorous style in character development. All around it's a great game that I think will remain timeless.
я считаю portal 2 одной из лучших игр!
very cool
игра разрешает 90 мин такто хорошая но не могу зайти

Wow, what an incredible game. Brilliant level design, beautiful story, and perfect pacing. Just built my first PC and wanted to play this first because of how well reviewed it was, and it certainly lives up to the rave reviews. One thing in particular I loved was the constant surprises; it's rare for a game to be unpredictable, but Portal 2 manages to do it consistently.

Also, the graphics still look incredible. 

A must-play!
melhor que cabeça de linguiça de feijão queimado.(mentira)

The graphics are decent considering it's from 2011. Personally i enjoyed the game. Mediocre dialogue, story was too lengthy for my taste. It's definitely one of those games where you play once and probably don't ever bother with it again. A solid 8 out of 10.

Bought this back in 2011 on Xbox 360, and bought it again now. The Nostalgia of playing this again was incredible and worth while. I had always wished they made a Portal 3 but the way they ended Portal 2 was satisfying and bittersweet playing it again. If you're wondering if you should get it again or play it for the first time, I wouldn't hesitate if i was you!

SONUNDA İYİ BİR OYUN

OH MY GOD THIS GAME IS SO FREAKING AMAZING!! This is hands-down my favorite puzzle game ever! The story is incredible and immersive, making you want to play even more! I am amazed at how a simple concept puzzle game can be so interactive and have so much lore behind it! This is by far my favorite valve game and it is way better than portal! It is a decent-length game with lots and lots of secrets that will keep you playing! With the CoOp mode, you can double your play time with around 40 new puzzles with a new story all in itself! The achievements and puzzles are creative and the characters are fun and perfectly made. I never knew a puzzle game could include so much comedy and perplexing drama! Get it now because this game is worth its money and time!

Super jeu, l'histoire est prenante du début à la fin. Une suite plus qu'à la hauteur pour une série très réussie.

Le coop est aussi très plaisant avec des amis. Mais faites attention au coup de p*tes !
The portals are literally seemless and it's like walking through a door. Amazing work, valve.

Dieses Spiel ist einfach eine Klasse für sich. Ich habe es mit einem Freund gekauft und wir saßen Stunden lang an diesem Spiel und uns wurde einfach nie langweilig. Super Maps, super Geschichte. Kann ich für jeden empfehlen, der single player ist auch ein rießen Spaß!

Oyunu kesinlikle öneririm. Çok güzel bir hikayesi var. Oyunu bitirdikten sonra kendinizi internet başında saatlerce bu oyun hakkında araştırma yaparken bulabilirsiniz. Oyunun sizi etkilemesi ayrı, internetten bu oyun hakkında öğrendikleriniz ayrı etkiliyor. Oyunu oynarken eğlence amaçlı oynuyorsunuz fakat sonu cidden vay be dedirttiyor. 

Bu arada şu küçük turretler çok tatlı ya :D 'are you still there?' 'who are you' 'target lost' 
Ayrıca oyun içerisinde GLaDOS'un ve Wheatley'in sizinle sohbet içerisinde olması çok güzel. Bazen küçük espriler yapıp bazense alttan alttan iğneleyici laflar ediyorlar :D

This game is a masterpiece. It is such basic consept yet so complicated, but still so easy to pick up and enjoy. I recommend this game 150% to every single person who is thinking about buying this game. Also a great gift.

My conclusion:

Flawless. One of my favorite games ever. If you decide to play it, it is going to be (about) 8 of the best hours of your life.

What else can be said about Portal 2? Pretty much the Holy Grail of game design. Smart, complex, beautiful to look at, and downright hilarious, this the game that can convert skeptics to the cause of gaming. If you ask me -- it's even better than Half-Life 2.

Well here we are again / It's always such a pleasure / Remember when you tried to kill me twice? / Oh how we laughed and laughed / Except I wasn't laughing / Under the circumstances / I've been shockingly nice / You want your freedom? / Take it / That's what I'm counting on / I used to want you dead / But / Now I only want you gone / She was a lot like you / Maybe not quiet as heavy / Now little Caroline is in here too / One day they woke me up / So I could live Forever / It's such a shame the same will never happen to you / You' ve got your short sad life left / That's what I'm counting on / I'll get you right to it / Now I only want you gone / Goodbye my only friend / Oh. Did you think I meant you? / That would be funny / If it weren't so sad / Well you have been replaced / I don't need anyone now / when I delete you maybe I stop feeling mad / Go make some new disaster / That's what I'm counting on / You're someone else's problem / Now I only< want you gone / Now I only want you gone / Now I only want you gone /
